title: EXPERIENCES
description: Fun for everyone at Teleios Dome! Come race with your friends or enjoy a work day out with colleagues through our exciting experiences. Choose from a variety of famous cars and world-renowned circuits, no matter your skill level, and get ready for non-stop excitement!
experience.title: 20-Minute Sprint
experience.description: Jump into a quick 20-minute sprint where your goal is to set the fastest lap. Perfect for those looking for a short, intense racing experience.
uniqueExperience.title: 20-Minute Sprint
uniqueExperience.description: Jump into a quick 20-minute sprint where your goal is to set the fastest lap. Perfect for those looking for a short, intense racing experience.
training.title: Private Events
training.description: Host an unforgettable private event at Teleios Dome, where you and your guests can experience the thrill of racing together in a professional level venue. Whether it's a corporate event, birthday party, or team-building exercise, we offer fully customizable packages tailored to your needs. Enjoy exclusive access to our simulators, lounge area, and personalized support to ensure your event is a winning experience.
dome.title: DOME
dome.description: The ultimate immersive entertainment experience for racing enthusiasts happens at Teleios Dome. State-of-the-art racing simulators, stylish lounge, VIP area, conference space, and gaming area await. Whether you are here for exhilarating races or social gatherings, Teleios Dome delivers an unforgettable experience.
Discover immersive learning experiences: Discover immersive learning experiences at Teleios Dome. From educational trips exploring our factory to safety driving lessons and group racing instruction, we offer dynamic programs to engage learners of all ages. Prepare to embark on an educational journey at Teleios Dome.
EXPERIENCE_20_MINUTE_DESC: Jump into a quick 20-minute sprint where your goal is to set the fastest lap. Perfect for those looking for a short, intense racing experience.
EXPERIENCE_40_MINUTE_DESC: Choose between a sprint for the fastest lap or a qualifying and race session with your friends. A great option for fun and friendly competition.
EXPERIENCE_60_MINUTE_DESC: Enjoy the full experience with a 60-minute session. Choose between a sprint for the fastest lap or a full qualifying and race session with your friends for the ultimate racing showdown.
PRIVATE_EVENTS_DESC: Whether it's a corporate event, birthday party, or team-building exercise, we offer fully customizable packages tailored to your needs
